content.rendered:
Business Setup

Company Incorporation Dubai

Set up your business in UAE with customized advisory services! Mainland, free zone or offshore company setup, A & A is the one-stop solution for all your business setup requirements!

Expert company incorporation in Dubai!

Book A Free Consultation

Home

Company Formation

We are experts in company formation laws and regulations. Therefore, we provide optimized solutions to launch your company with business license and other legal documents. We take up the complete company incorporation in Dubai by handling the negotiations with local stakeholders, go through strategic recommendations, and provide assistance towards the entire business floatation. 

With a deep knowledge and understanding of the business setup in UAE market, we offer professional formation services!

Read More

Registration & Licensing

Company incorporation in Dubai is a step by step process, it include registration of your company name and licensing of your business activity. We analyze your business activity and decide whether it requires commercial, industrial, or professional license. Additionally, we help you in the registration process by complying with the naming conventions and make it simple. 

We simplify the registration and licensing process with dedicated services!

Read More

Freezone Company Set Up

Free zones are free from income tax, custom duties, and corporate tax. Moreover, Free zones don’t require a UAE national as shareholder. We ensure company incorporation in Dubai free zones and all the other free zones in UAE or GCC region. We have a professional team to work on the legal structure of your company by obtaining all the approvals from concerned departments and achieve your business license. 

Read More

Offshore Company Formation

Offshore company incorporation requires well-organized financial planning. So, we comply with international standards and go through effective offshore company formation in Dubai. With this incorporation, enjoy tax-free ownership with no involvement of a UAE national. Offshore company formation is made easy and cost-effective with A&A associates. 

Read More

Request for OurFree Consultation

A A Associate

Business Setup in UAE

Contact Now
A A Associate

Legal Service

Contact Now

How it works

At A&A Associate LLC, our company incorporation Dubai process is simple and efficient. Here’s how it works:

Consultation
We begin with a personalized consultation to understand your business goals and needs.
Document Preparation
Our experts assist in gathering and preparing all necessary documents, customized to your jurisdiction and business type.
Filing and Submission
We handle the bureaucratic complexities, submitting your incorporation documents to the relevant authorities.
Review and Follow-up
We ensure accuracy and completeness, making any required revisions and following up on the progress.
Completion
Once approved, we provide you with your official company documents, setting you up for success in your new venture.
Count on A&A Associate LLC for a seamless and successful company incorporation journey.
